page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN KILREA
page.content: {INDUSTRY:}THERE IS NOT A GREAT DEAL OF INDUSTRY IN KILREA.ANY INDUSTRY THERE IS REVOLVES AROUND FARMING AND AGRICULTURE. {CRAIG'S MILL:}THE MILL IS ENGAGED IN THE MANUFACTURE OF FEEDSTUFFS FOR CATTLE AND PIGS.CRAIG'S MILL WAS ESTABLISHED IN 1828.TODAT IT IS STILL CONTROLLED BY THE CRAIG FAMILY. {COMPUTERISATION:}THE PLANT IS FULLY AUTOMATED AND COMPUTERISED.THIS HAS DRASTICALLY CURTAILED EMPLOYMENT IN THE PLANT.AT ONE TIME MORE THAN 30 PEOPLE WORKED THERE BUT NOW ONLY 19 ARE NEEDED. {MARKETING:}THE FINISHED PRODUCT IS SOLD TO FARMERS IN DERRY,NORTH ANTRIM AND PARTS OF TYRONE.
